attributes.action: Better promote free debt counselling services such as Citizens' Advice, so that people do not have to resort to commercial loan companies who profit from people's misery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What is particularly insidious, is that some loan companies often step up their advertising campaigns just after Christmas, for example, when people are especially vulnerable.  They are not interested in helping people find affordable solutions to their debt problems, only in profiting from misery and desperation.
